GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on total_data_blocks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit c9e4cd5b0ccd7168801d6a811919171b185c5cf8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on total_data_blocks
